plot: Dick Clark hosts this national search for America's brightest kids. Highly gifted 10-12 year old children compete for the honor of being "the smartest kid in America"
title: Battle of the Child Geniuses: Who Is the Smartest Kid in America?
plot_es: Dick Clark hosts this national search for America's brightest kids. Highly gifted 10-12 year old children compete for the honor of being "the smartest kid in America"
original_name: Battle of the Child Geniuses: Who Is the Smartest Kid in America?
plot_en: Dick Clark hosts this national search for America's brightest kids. Highly gifted 10-12 year old children compete for the honor of being "the smartest kid in America"
